title: LendUp
description: LendUp is in the business of improving payday lending. And it’s now opening its vault to let other organizations offer similar services via its API. It uses machine learning and algorithms to pinpoint the top 15% that are most likely to repay their loans. It charges them interest rates starting at 29% without hidden charges or rollover fees.
description_lemmatized: lendup business improving payday lending opening vault let organization offer similar service via api us machine learning algorithm pinpoint top 15 likely repay loan charge interest rate starting 29 without hidden charge rollover fee
